QuestData.Title: The Loyalty of Clan Mullan
QuestData.Description: Your point's made. Keegan can count on us. We'll meet'm back at town as soon as all the boys are rallied up.$B$BYou're tough for not bein' a Wildhammer. Guess they breed'm good where you come from too.$B$BStill, haven't seen ya drink yet. That'll be the real test.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return the news on Clan Mullan to Iain Firebeard at the Firebeard Cemetery.
QuestData.RewardText: Ya got the Mullans. Good news! They're worth more than their weight in a fight, and they ain't exactly skinny.
